item.title: Garlic & Chive Veggie Burger Recipe
item.description: You will need: A food processor White kidney beans (2x tins) Butter beans (1x small tin) ½ chopped onion Crushed garlic (4 cloves) Chives (2 tbsp) 4-6 heaped tbsp gluten free flour A splash of vegetable oil Salt (⅓ tsp) Black pepper (½ tsp) Turmeric (⅓ tsp) Garlic and Chive Veggie Burger What to do: Add the onion, garlic, black pepper, turmeric & salt into the food processor.
